refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function initializes selected quadrature encoder module (ENC1, ENC2) with provided initial value. Quadrature encoder supports x4 mode and accepts input signals frequency up to 20MHz.

listitem.para: module: MicroDAQ quadrature encoder module number (1 or 2)
initValue: Initial position value for selected quadrature encoder module
